title: Sanctuary cities at Tea Party
content: The Chino Tea Party will meet 9 to 11 a.m. Saturday, June 9 at Archibald’s Drive-Thru, 15421 Fairfield Ranch Road, Chino Hills.    Speakers will be Sean Flynn, candidate for U.S. Congressional District 31, and Robin Hvidston, executive director of We the People Rising, who will speak on SB54, which makes California a “sanctuary state” by legalizing and standardizing statewide non-cooperation policies between California law enforcement agencies and federal immigration authorities.
